title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Elementary Social Studies: Intercultural Communication Skills in LIS E-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three strategies for effectively communicating with individuals from diverse cultural backgrounds
Learners can practice culturally sensitive communication methods through e-interview simulations
Learners recognize the importance of intercultural collaboration through analysis of global collaboration cases in LIS (Library and Information Science)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
